listItem.name: Small Diamond Chest
listItem.desc: Opening this chest yields 20 diamond.

listItem.name: Medium Diamond Chest
listItem.desc: Opening this chest yields 50 diamond.

listItem.name: Large Diamond Chest
listItem.desc: Opening this chest yields 100 diamond.

listItem.name: Massive Diamond Chest
listItem.desc: Opening this chest yields 250 diamond.

listItem.name: Epic Hero Fragments
listItem.desc: Combining 60 Epic Hero Fragments will yield a random epic hero.

listItem.name: Legendary Hero Fragments
listItem.desc: Combining 60 Legendary Hero Fragments will yield a legendary epic hero.

listItem.name: Dwarven Epic Hero Card
listItem.desc: Activating this item yields a random epic hero of the Dwarf Kingdom.

listItem.name: Druidic Epic Hero Card
listItem.desc: Activating this item yields a random epic hero of the Druid Kingdom.

listItem.name: Banished Epic Hero Card
listItem.desc: Activating this item yields a random epic hero of the Banished Kingdom.

listItem.name: Kingdom Legendary Hero Card
listItem.desc: Activating this item yields a random legendary hero of the chosen Kingdom.

listItem.desc: Activating this item yields a random elite hero equipment.

listItem.name: Epic Equipment Chest
listItem.desc: Activating this item yields a random epic hero equipment.

listItem.name: Legendary Equipment Chest

listItem.name: Rare Gem Chest

listItem.name: Legendary Gem Chest

listItem.name: Protector's Emblem - 3 days
listItem.desc: Activating this item will grant player benefits of the Protector of Asteria for 3 days. Once activated, activation of further items of this type will lengthen remaining time of benefits by total time of activated items.

listItem.name: Protector's Emblem - 30 days
listItem.desc: Activating this item will grant player benefits of the Protector of Asteria for 30 days. Once activated, activation of further items of this type will lengthen remaining time of benefits by total time of activated items.

listItem.name: Archmage's Emblem - 3 days
listItem.desc: Activating this item will grant player benefits of the Archmage of Asteria for 30 days. Once activated, activation of further items of this type will lengthen remaining time of benefits by total time of activated items.

listItem.name: Archmage's Emblem - 30 days
listItem.desc: Activating this item will grant player benefits of the Archmage of Asteria for 30 days. Once activated, activation of further items of this type will lengthen remaining time of benefits by total time of activated items.
